objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor panel with a neutral smooth finish, representing the booth footprint. It has a minimalist design, measuring 6 meters wide, 4 meters deep, and 0.1 meters thick, suitable for supporting furniture and foot traffic.

A rectangular wall panel with a neutral smooth finish, minimalist aesthetic. Each panel is uniform thickness, standing 2.5 meters tall with varying widths, and provides a clean, modern boundary for the booth.

A sleek modern registration desk with a bright red finish, featuring clean rectangular lines and a sturdy flat surface. It measures 1.5 meters wide, 0.6 meters deep, and 1.1 meters tall, offering an inviting focal point at the booth entrance.

A medium-sized modern display shelf with a vibrant cyan finish. It features a rectangular frame supporting three open shelving surfaces, standing 1.8 meters tall, 1 meter wide, and 0.4 meters deep, ideal for product presentation.

A small rectangular meeting table with a minimalist white finish. It has a smooth top surface and four straight legs, measuring 1.2 meters long, 0.6 meters deep, and 0.75 meters tall, perfect for casual discussions.

A standard meeting chair with a clean white matte finish, featuring a flat seat surface, a vertical backrest, and four slender legs. Each chair measures approximately 0.4 meters wide, 0.4 meters deep, and 0.8 meters tall.

A decorative hanging banner with a bright yellow finish, designed with a lightweight rectangular fabric appearance. Each banner measures 2 meters wide, 1 meter tall, and 0.1 meters thick, adding visual interest to the booth walls.

A flat rectangular ceiling panel with a neutral white finish, smooth minimalist surface measuring 6 meters by 4 meters with a thickness of 0.1 meters, intended to mount overhead fixtures.

A compact cylindrical spotlight with a pale yellow tinted metallic finish. The housing is 0.1 meters in diameter and 0.6 meters in length, featuring a narrow light aperture designed to cast focused beams downward.
